评论详情: Loved,  ended up going with something diff but this was very cute
The dress fits perfect.  The color and material is comfortable.  Will buy another colour.

Let me start off by saying that I am not a dress girly. Being extra fluffy, I just don't feel comfortable in a dress. I wanted something i could maybe wear on vacation. I didn't end up wearing it bc im too self conscious but it's a pretty dress. It's pretty flattering bc it ties around the waist. I usually wear a 2-3x and this fit almost perfect. A tad snug around my chest but nothing terrible. It's a nice weight material. Not too thick or thin. I'm short at 5 ft 1/2 inch and it went down to my ankles. The bottom of my ankles. 😉. Didn't drag ir anything though. It's really cute. If I can get over myself I may even wear it in public one day😆
It was shipped quick. Lightweight material, love the fit. Wore it to a wedding.
Not flattering. Runs a bit small. Fabric cheap. I returned this dress

评论概述: It's a great dress, just not for me
评论详情: This is a great dress, I just didn't like the way it fit me.  The way the bottom ruffle laid was strange on me.  It's a great material.  Sad to be sending it back.

This KIMCURVY Plus Size dress is one of my favorites! I wear this at least once a week. Every time I feel phenomenal. The fit is perfect. The hem line comes down to about mid-calf, but does not make me look like I'm wearing a mumu. As a short, thick gal...IYKYK.  The banding throughout the body and skirt creates movement while highlighting the small of the waist. The simple style makes this dress versatile. I have worn it for every occasion from the beach to a corporate meeting, with accessories anything is possible. Even with *almost* full coverage the dress is lightweight. In 90 degree weather I was comfortable and not drenched in boob sweat. Going braless is a safe bet too because of the full coverage bodice. No nip slips here!  Seriously, this dress is so feminine and flirty. I feel like a babe every time I put it on. It's truly effortless.  5/5
This dress was very pretty, but I couldn't stand the feel of the material. Spine-chilling bad.
Nice dress for the summer. Love the halter top design. I am a 2x and it fit me like expected. Love the pattern. Nice and stylish.

I'm a size 24, and the size 24 of this fit true to size. It was too long for me. (I'm only 5'2".) It just wasn't worth hemming as I really didn't  like the polyester fabric-It reminded me of a crinoline. Very non breathable and makes a sound when wearing. For me, it's a no.

I LOVE this dress, it's pretty even if you have a tummy and it's sooo comfortable. The neckline is modest enough to wear pretty much anywhere and the straps aren't too snug. It feels so flowy and cute. It's lightweight and pairs well with some cute sandals. The quality is pretty good, it didn't pop any stitches putting it on.

This dress is so cute and flattering. I absolutely love how it looks on me, and the material is nice and comfortable. I plan on wearing it a LOT once the weather warms up a bit. Great for a summer day out or for date night.

评论概述: No Pockets but I still love it
评论详情: I love this black dress. The neckline is so cool and different. I wore a cross sports bra with it so you can barely see the bra straps. I like the black lightweight material. It is perfect for summer. The only con of this dress is there are NO pockets! Booo! The skirt is comfortable and this dress is flattering for plus sizes! Great buy!

I was excited to recieve this dress because I needed more summer outfits. This dress is really pretty. I picked the blue floral and I really like both the color and the pattern. The dress is breathable and light, but the fabric is still well put together. It is true to size and fits really well. It is going to be my go to summer dress. I highly recommend!
Such a cute dress.  I recommend this product.
